full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BCOS DBU MA LA 'JUG PA'I RNAM BSHAD DGONGS PA RAB GSAL GYI DKA' GNAS GSAL BAR BYED PA'I SPYI DON LEGS BSHAD SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @204A *, ,DBU MA LA 'JUG PA'I RNAM BSHAD DGONGS PA RAB GSAL GYI @204B DKA' GNAD RNAMS GSAL BAR BYED PA SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA, ^RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS SER CHOS SDING GI GZIMS KHANG SER POR SBYAR BA'O,,, ,,AOm SVASTI, RMAD BYUNG TSOGS GNYIS CHU GTER CHE LAS 'KHRUNGS, ,NGO MTSAR MTSAN DPE'I DKYIL 'KHOR YONGS SU RDZOGS, ,RTEN 'BYUNG GTAM GYIS SRID ZHI'I RGUD MUN 'PHROG ,SMRA BA'I DAM PA SH'AKYA'I RGYAL POR 'DUD, ,LEGS GSUNG SNYING PO SHER PHYIN ZAB MO'I DON, ,JI BZHIN 'GREL MDZAD KLU SGRUB YAB SRAS KYI, ,DGONGS PA MA NOR RAB TU GSAL MDZAD PA, ,'JAM MGON BLA MA'I ZHABS LA GUS PHYAG 'TSAL, ,GANG GI LEGS BSHAD YID BZHIN DBANG GI RGYAL, ,LUNG RIGS BYE BAS BYI DOR LEGS BGYIS TE, ,BSHAD SGRUB CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN RTZER MCHOD PA, ,RJE BTZUN RIGS PA'I DBANG PHYUG DE LA 'DUD, ,RTEN CING 'BREL 'BYUNG DBU MA'I LAM SROL MCHOG ,MA NOR GSAL BAR STON PA'I GZHUNG BZANG 'DI, ,LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I 'OD STONG 'PHROS PA YIS, ,ZAB DON PADMO'I TSAL RNAMS CIG CAR 'BYED, ,'DI NI SRAS BCAS RGYAL BA'I GSHEGS SHUL NYID, ,SKAL BZANG THAR 'DOD RNAMS LA THAR PA DANG, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I LAM BZANG MTSON PA'I MIG ,MKHAS GRUB BYE BA'I 'JUG NGOGS MCHOG KYANG YIN, ,DE PHYIR BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO LEGS BSHAD 'DI, ,RING DU GNAS SLAD LHAG BSAM DGE BA CAN, ,RIG GNAS KUN LA @205A *, ,GRVA RIGS RNAMS KYIS NI, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR NAS BKOD LEGS PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I RNAM DKAR DGE TSOGS MTHUS, ,'JAM MGON RGYAL BA'I THUGS KYI NYING KHU MCHOG ,MTHA' BRAL DBU MA'I 'CHAD NYAN RING LUGS 'DI, ,MTHA' DBUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS GYUR CIG ,'BREL THOGS MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA MA LUS PA, ,SKYE ZHING SKYE BAR RGYAL BSTAN SNYING PO DANG, ,MI 'BRAL THABS SHES ZUNG 'BREL NYAMS LEN GYIS, ,KUN MKHYEN GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR SHOG ,GZHUNG MCHOG 'DI LA THOS BSAM BYED PA LA, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS, ,GA-YEL BA MED PAR SRUNG SKYOB MDZAD PA DANG, ,MTHUN RKYEN LHUN GYIS 'GRUB PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,(CES 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS DNGOS RIGS PA'I DBANG PHYUG SER RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I DBU MA'I SPYI DON LEGS BSHAD SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN 'DI NYID, SKYOR DPON DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG ,DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG CHOS 'PHEL, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR SOGS DBU MA GSAR BA'I 'DZIN GRA'I GRVA PA RNAMS KYIS CHOG SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS MTHUN RKYEN LEGS PAR SBYAR TE DGE LDAN BSTAN RGYAS GLING DU PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I TSE PAR BYANG RNYING PA LA 'BRI BSNON CUNG ZAD BGYIS PA 'DI YANG, BLA MA DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS BSTEN PA SNYOM LAS PA DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
